trans-unit.source:
\n

Represents a view of a memory-mapped file as a sequentially accessed stream.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxxx x xxxx xx x xxxxxx$xxxxxx xxxx xx x xxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
[Supported in the .NET Framework 4.5.1 and later versions]

Gets the number of bytes by which the starting position of this view is offset from the beginning of the memory-mapped file.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$Xxxxxxxxx xx xxx .XXX Xxxxxxxxx 0.0.0 xxx xxxxx xxxxxxxx$ $$x$$x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx xx xxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxx xxxx xx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx$xxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The number of bytes between the starting position of this view and the beginning of the memory-mapped file.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxx xxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx$xxxxxx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The object from which this instance was created is null.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets a handle to the view of a memory-mapped file.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx x xxxxxx xx xxx xxxx xx x xxxxxx$xxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A wrapper for the operating system's handle to the view of the file.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx$x xxxxxx xx xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Clears all buffers for this stream and causes any buffered data to be written to the underlying file.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xx xx xxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Sets the length of the current stream.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The desired length of the current stream in bytes.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx.$$x$$x
